name: Community Radio Tycoon
description:
This is the beta version of "Community Radio Tycoon."

PLAY SONGS: Listen to any of five public domain bangers to generate money!

BUY UPGRADES: Boost each song's payout by purchasing upgrades!

LEVEL UP STAFF: They don't do anything but you can still get them to level five!

EARN MILESTONES: Get rewarded for playing the game (with in-game text achievements)!

Added Beta features: loading screen, Milestones, Upgrades, button sound effects, credits, and an opening sound
